    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.awt.Graphics g,
                   int xOffset,
                   int yOffset)
        if the antivirus is following Update the location of the main.antivirus.AntiVirus. this is done by looping through all the virus group's viruses and if the virus is within the acceptable range the virus follows the cell currentVirus is saved, and positionOfViruses that is being followed is saved calls the follow method else reduced the health of the virus. Then moves the antivirus to the currentViruses position. Then calls follow.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics of the window
        xOffset - the xOffset of the window. Used to move the window around
        yOffset - the yOffset of the window. Used to move the window around

      • follow

        private void follow(java.awt.Graphics g,
                    int xOffset,
                    int yOffset)
        Moves the antivirus. Then if it really close draw a line. If the virus is dead remove it from the main.virus.VirusGroupManager. then set follow to false;
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics of the window
        xOffset - the xOffset of the window. Used to move the window around
        yOffset - the yOffset of the window. Used to move the window around

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 int xOffset,
                 int yOffset)
        Draws the Antivirus at that position
        Parameters:
        g - draws the rectangle of the virus
        xOffset - the offset to render the object on the screen according to how the screen had shifted
        yOffset - same as above
